Source.Name: proxychains-ng
Source.Summary: A preloader which hooks calls to sockets in dynamically linked programs and redirects it through one or more socks/http proxies
Source.Description: ProxyChains is a UNIX program, that hooks network-related libc functions in DYNAMICALLY LINKED programs via a preloaded DLL (dlsym(), LD_PRELOAD) and redirects the connections through SOCKS4a/5 or HTTP proxies. It supports TCP only (no UDP/ICMP etc).
